description: List driver assignment rules with filtering and pagination.
permissions: User can list rules for levels that are in their policy scope; scope is derived from the level policy and admins are permitted.
validation_notes: Level filtering only applies when both --level-type and --level-id are provided; broker filter is optional.

flags.name: --level-type
flags.description: Filter by level type (Broker, JobScheduleShift, Project, JobProductionPlan, MaterialSupplier, MaterialSite, MaterialType, Trucker, JobSite).
flags.validation: One of Broker, JobScheduleShift, Project, JobProductionPlan, MaterialSupplier, MaterialSite, MaterialType, Trucker, JobSite.

flags.name: --level-id
flags.validation: Used together with --level-type to filter by level.
